titleStmt.title: A just vindication of my earnest expostulation, added to my book, called The Antichrists and Sadduces detected, &c. directed to the pious and learned, in the Church of England, and among the dissenters, against the trifling exceptions of Edward Pennington, which he calls Some observations, etc.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
